sentences.english: A method for analysis of Chloramphenicol residues in sheep casing has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 建立羊肠衣中氯霉素残留含量的分析方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion This eye drops may be stored for 4 months at room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 结论地塞米松氯霉素滴眼液的有效期暂定为4个月。

sentences.english: Does chloromycetin eye cream can you brush blain blain?
sentences.chinese: 氯霉素眼膏可以擦痘痘的吗？

sentences.english: Nitrofurans and chloramphenicol are substances widely used in shrimp production.
sentences.chinese: 硝基呋喃类和氯霉素等是广泛使用在虾生产中的物质。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the stability of Chloramphenicol eye drop and improve its formulation and preparation.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氯霉素滴眼液的稳定性，改进其处方工艺。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo establish ratio spectrophotometry for determination of chloramphenicol and salicylic acid in tincture.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立氯柳酊中氯霉素和水杨酸的比值光谱测定法。

sentences.english: All cases were cured after treated with chloramphenicolum or tetracycline tablets and supportive liver protection therapy.
sentences.chinese: 所有患者经氯霉素或四环素类片剂及保肝治疗均痊愈。

sentences.english: It also has activity against many chloramphenicol-resistant strains of bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 氟苯尼考对大部分氯霉素耐药株仍然有效。

sentences.english: Give me a bottke of Chkoromycetinand one bottke of Ofkoxacin eye drop, appkicabke for conjunctivitis.
sentences.chinese: 给我来一瓶氯霉素和氧氟沙星眼药水，能治结膜炎的。

sentences.english: In drug sensitivity test, all pasteurella anatipestifer were highly susceptible to chloramphenicol.
sentences.chinese: 药敏试验显示所有菌株对氯霉素高度敏感。
